column13: Quechua Arpenaz 100 Hiking Shoes (By Decathlon) Price: Rs.2183

column1: The need to be one with nature is but a basal instinct in every man. Whenever you’re plagued with the desire to explore the great outdoors
column2: lace up these rugged hiking shoes
column3: grab your compass and set off. These black and grey hiking shoes have been built to tame the wilderness around you
column4: while taking you from one milestone to the next
column5: all at the peak of comfort. The Quechua Arpenac Hiking Shoes have a cushioned footbed and ankle to provide your feet with the support they need
column6: as they navigate all kinds of terrain.

column1: Creating an innovative range of shoes which also comes with unmatched designs
column2: Quechua is a brand that excels in catering to the sports needs of the passionate sportsman. The Novadry concept offers waterproofing and breathability
column3:
and these shoes can be used in temperatures as low as -22 degree celcius while active use.

column1: Air out your shoes after every wear and clean with a mild detergent.
